content:
Also the pyramid in the example is:
      * 
    **
  ***
****
?
if yes it's more likely a stairs, maybe better task to draw smmetrical structure like this:

      *
   * * *
* * * * *
In that case correct output would be - (9, 1)
i think better way to show the goal is an example of pyramid.

In many real life situations, the details of what you are expected to produce may not be so explicitly stated. Worse still, your task may be so abstract that it has no easy visualization. Your goal is to come up with the best solution based on the minimal information you have.

Google image search 2D Pyramid ðŸ˜‰

Bricks are normally laid out in a staggered formation for strength and stability. At the end of the day this is all in our heads and 2^16 high virtual pyramid isn't going to topple over, but if our solution doesn't make sense in the real world is it really a useful one?
